pr_title: Fix #2311: Add Support for creating bootstrap project template

timeline.message:
Fix #2311: Add Support for creating bootstrap project template

Just like `oc adm create-bootstrap-project-template` generates a template yaml for
project request resources to be created; OpenShiftClient should be able to
generate + Apply resources based upon project request name, description, display name,
requesting user and admin user. It should create the following resources:

- Project (actual project to be created)
- RoleBinding system:deployers
- RoleBinding system:image-builders
- RoleBinding system:image-pullers
- RoleBinding admin

timeline.bodyText: Is creating a new ProjectOperationsImpl instance necessary?
timeline.author: manusa

timeline.bodyText: nit: Maybe calling this initProject would be less confusing. By the name of the method I'm unsure if this will retrieve a project from the server or something in those lines.
timeline.author: manusa

timeline.bodyText: nit: same as https://github.com/fabric8io/kubernetes-client/pull/2376/files#r467693276, probably initRoleBinding is more clear
timeline.author: manusa
manusa
